text: Maybe, it's a route to think the "From Template" option already shows a lot. Technically when a new user touches workflows, he/she already went trough some properties. Or what would be the intended end result for that Hello world tutorial?

Well if you think back to when you learned to code, your first instinct was probably not to go into Stack Overflow and copy paste a mostly working solution to a problem you were looking to solve, but rather you wanted to get your hands dirty and learn to _code_
`Hello world!` tutorials are meant to teach you how to use the system, in a throw-away sort of way
it removes the need to understand real content (forms, properties, HubSpot in general) and instead focuses on the experience and features of the tool, in this case, Workflows
I like this idea a lot
